data.title: Vancouver Short Film Festival
data.meta_description: These are the 2018 Award-winning Films. Every year, the Vancouver Short Film Festival awards BC filmmakers thousands of dollars in prizes and in-kind services from our generous supporters in the film community.
data.text:
WILLIAM F. WHITE INTERNATIONAL INC. AWARD FOR

BEST SHORT FILM

$2,500 IN LIGHTING AND GRIP RENTALS

Winner: CYPHER

​

​

FUSION CINE AWARD FOR

BEST STUDENT SHORT FILM​

$500 IN RENTALS

Winner: THE GOOD FIGHT

​

​

DIRECTORS GUILD OF CANADA AWARD FOR

BEST DIRECTOR

$1,000

Winners:

LAWRENCE LE LAM for CYPHER

MINTIE PARDOE for THE GOOD FIGHT

​

​

WOMEN IN FILM AND TELEVISION AWARD FOR

BEST FEMALE DIRECTOR

1 X ENTRY TO WIFTV BREAKFAST

1 X WIFTV WORKSHOP ADMISSION

2018 WOMEN IN FILM FESTIVAL PASS

Winner: MAYUMI YOSHIDA for AKASHI

​

​

LANGARA COLLEGE AWARD FOR

BEST SCREENPLAY

$500

Winner: JESSICA GRECO for JESSICA JESSICA

​

​

VSFF AWARD FOR

BEST CINEMATOGRAPHY

$500 IN RENTALS AT GEARHOUSE RENTALS

FREE 2-DAY WORKSHOP AT INFOCUS FILM SCHOOL

Winner: LEONARDO HARIM for CYPHER

​

VSFF AWARD FOR

BEST ACTOR FEMALE

$250 FROM UBCP/ACTRA

$125 FROM SFU CONTEMPORARY ARTS

Winner: JESSICA PARSONS for THE GOOD FIGHT

​

​

VSFF AWARD FOR

BEST ACTOR MALE

$250 FROM UBCP/ACTRA

$125 FROM SFU CONTEMPORARY ARTS

Winner: ALEX BARIMA for CYPHER

​

​​

ZOIC STUDIOS VFX AWARD FOR

BEST VISUAL EFFECTS

$500

Winner: AFTER WE LEFT OUR HOMES

​

VSFF AWARD FOR

BEST SOUND DESIGN

1 DAY ON THE MIX STAGE AT WESTERN POST PROVIDED BY AIR BUD ENTERTAINMENT/WESTERN POST

1 DAY ON THE ADR STAGE AT WESTERN POST PROVIDED BY AIR BUD ENTERTAINMENT/WESTERN POST

Winner: ROBERT PHANEUF for CYPHER

​

​

CANADIAN CINEMA EDITORS AWARD FOR

BEST EDITING

$500 & 1 x CCE MEMBERSHIP

Winner: SHUN ANDO for AKASHI

​

​

RAINDANCE VANCOUVER AWARD FOR

THE UNDERDOG FILM

1 X RAINDANCE MEMBERSHIP

1 X RAINDANCE WORKSHOP ADMISSION

Winner: MENTAL

​

​

THUNDERBIRD ENTERTAINMENT AWARD FOR

AUDIENCE CHOICE AWARD

SPONSORED DINNER WITH A THUNDERBIRD EXECUTIVE

Winner: UNDER THE RADAR

​

AFTER DARK DOOR PRIZE

2 TICKETS TO THE VANCOUVER BADASS FILM FESTIVAL

​​

​

VSFF DOOR PRIZE

2 TICKETS TO THE CRAZY8S GALA SCREENING

GROWLER PACKAGE FROM GRANVILLE ISLAND BREWERY

3 X HEADSET PACKAGES

Vancouver Short Film Festival and the city of Vancouver where we operate is located on the unceded traditional territories of the xʷməθkʷəy̓əm (Musqueam), sḵwx̱wú7mesh (Squamish), and sel̓íl̓witulh (Tsleil-Waututh) nations. For further information on these and other Indigenous territories where we live, work, and create, we invite you to learn more atnative-land.ca.
